message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation with a price of $1200000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but $1200000 is a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand that $900000 is a bit lower than my initial price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to consider a price of $1050000. This is my best offer so far, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $1050000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand that $950000 is still a bit lower than I'd like, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1075000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your concession, but $1075000 is still out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $975000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

I understand that we're close to the final stretch, and I'm willing to make one last concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1025000. This is my absolute final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
I'm afraid I'm not willing to go any higher than my previous offer of $975000. I'm willing to walk away if we can't come to an agreement.
